Posted By: jonnyrue2u (6/16/2010 8:08:25 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
It beats [Goblin Piker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Piker)! Maybe you play it with [Light of Sanction](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Light of Sanction) and [Destructive Force](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Destructive Force)?
  
   
It seems like this is a card that could pay off if you build around him, since in a multiplayer game it is fairly likely that a turn two Akki Raider followed by a turn 3 [Tremble](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tremble) will let you hit someone for 5 or 6. Having said this, land destruction is not a particularly fun deck to play against, and it's harder to pull off in multiplayer, so the most satisfaction you may get is from using an unusual card to kill people.
posts.html:
It beats Goblin Piker! Maybe you play it with Light of Sanction and Destructive Force?

It seems like this is a card that could pay off if you build around him, since in a multiplayer game it is fairly likely that a turn two Akki Raider followed by a turn 3 Tremble will let you hit someone for 5 or 6. Having said this, land destruction is not a particularly fun deck to play against, and it's harder to pull off in multiplayer, so the most satisfaction you may get is from using an unusual card to kill people.
